attributes.action: Immediately send millions in humanitarian aid to Gaza
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone has seen the mounting evidence for starvation in the gaza strip, sending in humanitarian aid including food, medicine and infrastructure to help with what will undoubtably be associated refeeding syndrome.
The lack of action from this and the previous parliment has directly led to the worsening of these issues, reconciliation of this fact must start immediately with massive amounts of humanitarian aid.
Immediately sending £100m+ in aid would be a start (Aid to ukraine is £21.8b as now)
attributes.background: We would like millions in aid to be sent to gaza, in light of the recent ceasefire agreement, the recognition of the palestinian state and the widespread evidence of starvation/famine from notable human rights organisations. enormous amounts of humanitarian aid is required

rejection.details:
The UK already plans to spend £101m aid in OPTs this year: https://questions-statements.parliament.uk/written-questions/detail/2025-04-24/47670

You may wish to sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737736
